WARNING: DO NOT BE FOOLED BY THE RATING

Well, what can I say? I have around 120 hours on this game and yet I can't say much about it. My original review was "A bit of a learning curve, but the game is really fun!" I think now is the time I change it. 

The devs don't care about the game, they never try to fix problems, the community is always toxic, ranks don't mean anything (only longer queue times), toxic killers, toxic survivors, etc.

Well, I guess this is where I leave the review, get the game on a good sale and try it, but don't expect the best.

This game is very fun and not OP on either side. I feel like a lot of the time people say killer is OP at low ranks but is not too much if you have a single good runner you can win off that. I started at rank 20 and went all the way to rank 2 alone was hard but not impossible. One killer side its not OP either I find it very hard when facing a group on friends which makes sense but I am a bad killer so eh. The only con about this game has to BE HITBOXES. You will be threw a window and get hit and the worst part is when you vault and it uses lithe and you still get hit but are tired.

I highly recommend this game to anyone wanting to have a fun enjoyable horror game experience. This game is overall balanced and rewards objective play and teamwork. This game is also has licensed content from popular horror movie franchises such as Halloween, Nightmare on Elm Street, and Saw. This game is a must for you and your friends. See you all in the trial.

Everything below this paragraph is an old review, but it surprisingly still stands, because the company managing this game does NOT care about growing it's community. Nothing is fixed, nothing is improved. I want this game format to be good so badly, but this is not the game that will do it. Hopefully the developers of In Silence will step up to the plate. Buy that game instead. It is a definite more enjoyable experience. Please reference this video before purchasing: https://youtu.be/nkNawWldkcM

OLD REVIEW:
This game has been out for a long time and its still riddled with bugs and balance issues. This game is definitely NOT new player friendly now. Would not recommend to anybody looking to start this game now. And to anybody still playing the game after all this time... I'm so sorry. There are better games out there.

The matchmaking is utterly broken. As a new player, I am consistently matched against high level players and they destroy me, therefore de-ranking me. Putting me in a place where I am more competitive? Nope...

EDIT: I decided to put in some time to see if it gets better. The game is only really playable once you sink about 100 hours into it so you can have some decent perks. I put 52 hours in this game and I feel like I am still steamrolled every match by players with more hours than me.

Double EDIT: I have now logged enough time to get good enough perks on 1 killer and 2 survivors.... 78 hours. However, this game is still insanely unbalanced. I have taken screenshots every time I have been matched against a team way out of my league,but I don't know why I bother keeping records. This company doesn't give a s**t about it players or making a good game. Its dying now because of it and almost everyone is holding hands and singing good riddance. May this game burn in the eternal failure hell with the worst games of all time. So much potential squandered... The plot twist at the end of this horror franchise is that the company was the real villain. I hope someone with pride redoes this game type, but correctly.

I've put over 750 hours into this game in less than a year and a half.  I've been through quite a few changes over time but not since the beginning "dark times."  Overall the game is fun quite basic to learn but to master the game actually takes a bit of skill.  Stay away from ranks 7 to 1 as the game starts to get much harder and less fun.
